WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Darkness
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Enthrall
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: You weave a distracting string of words, causing creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear you to make a Wisdom saving throw.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Hold Person
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Invisibility
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Mirror Image
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Misty Step
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Shatter
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Spider Climb
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings.

WarlockLevel2Spells.Name: Suggestion
WarlockLevel2Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.
